examples.en: She plants flowers in her garden.
The farmer planted rice last week.
examples.zh: 那个农民上周种了水稻。

examples.en: We planted vegetables in our backyard.
The teacher has planted the idea of sustainability in her students.
examples.zh: 老师已经在学生心中种下了可持续发展的理念。

examples.en: The company has planted sensors throughout the building.
examples.zh: 该公司在整栋大楼里安装了传感器。
